Consumer Electronics Applications

Wire Harness Solutions for Consumer Electronics

Custom wire assemblies designed for consumer electronics applications. From smartphones to wearables, we deliver solutions that meet industry requirements for compact design, reliability, and cost-effectiveness.

Key Applications

Smartphones & Tablets

Internal power and signal connections with ultra-compact 2.0mm pitch connectors.

Wearable Devices

Ultra-fine pitch assemblies for smartwatches, fitness trackers, and health monitors.

Audio Equipment

Headphones, earbuds, speakers, and portable audio player wire assemblies.

Smart Home Devices

IoT hubs, smart controllers, home automation sensor connections.

Portable Power

Power bank battery connections, charging cables, portable power solutions.

Camera & Imaging

Action cameras, drones, security cameras, imaging device wire assemblies.

Industry Requirements We Understand

✓ Ultra-Compact Design

2.0mm and 2.5mm pitch connectors for high-density PCB layouts in space-constrained devices.

✓ Cost Sensitivity

High-volume production with competitive unit costs to meet consumer price point requirements.

✓ Fast Time-to-Market

Rapid prototyping and quick production scaling for product launches and seasonal demands.

✓ Regulatory Compliance

UL, RoHS, REACH certified materials and processes for global market access.

✓ Quality Consistency

100% testing and statistical process control for minimal field failures and returns.

✓ Supply Chain Reliability

Inventory management and flexible scheduling to support just-in-time manufacturing.

Wire Harness Forms We Provide

Pre-Crimped Wire Assemblies

Ready-to-use wire leads with connectors pre-attached. Ideal for rapid prototyping and mass production.

  • • Various lengths available
  • • Custom wire gauges
  • • Quick-turn delivery

Wire-to-Board Assemblies

PCB connectors with wire harnesses for internal device connections.

  • • Compact pitch options
  • • Secure locking
  • • Low-profile designs

Wire-to-Wire Assemblies

Interconnecting wire harnesses for module-to-module connections.

  • • Custom configurations
  • • Multi-branch options
  • • Overmolded available

Compliance & Testing Standards

✓ Safety Compliance

UL certified materials and assemblies compliant with consumer electronics safety standards.

✓ Environmental Standards

RoHS and REACH compliant materials for global market access and environmental regulations.

✓ 100% Electrical Testing

Continuity testing, hi-pot testing, and insulation resistance verification on every assembly.

✓ Mechanical Testing

Pull testing, flex testing, and strain relief validation for durable connections.

Consumer Electronics Project Examples

Smartwatch Power Assembly

Custom 4-wire battery charging assembly with integrated strain relief and flexible routing for compact wearable design.

4-Wire Overmolded

Bluetooth Audio Cable Assembly

Shielded twisted pair assembly with custom connectors for premium headphones. Includes EMI protection and flexible strain relief for user comfort.

Shielded Custom Length

IoT Sensor Hub Wiring

Multi-branch wire loom connecting main controller to 8 sensors for reliable power and signal distribution.

Multi-Branch

Consumer Electronics Wire Requirements?

From prototype to mass production, we deliver terminal wire solutions optimized for consumer electronics applications.
